explains: n. 贵族，贵族阶级；贵族统治

sentences.en: An "aristocracy of virtue and talent" thus could be recruited from all classes.
sentences.cn: 因此，一个德才兼备的贵族阶层可以从各个阶层中招募。

sentences.en: New technology demanded military aristocracy, and chivalric culture bore its marks for a millennium.
sentences.cn: 新技术要求军事贵族制，而骑士文化则标志着千年的历史。

sentences.en: Their aristocratic outfit, aristocracy of birth, which is legitimized by their heroic behavior on the battlefield.
sentences.cn: 他们的贵族的身份和贵族出身，由于他们在战场上的英雄行为而被认可。
